Description_lang: Curses an enemy, reducing its movement speed by $s6% and rendering it unable to attack or cast spells for $d. In addition, upon expiring $@spellname252781 spreads to players within $252845A1 yards.
AuraDescription_lang: Unable to attack or cast spells.Movement speed reduced by $s6%.Upon expiration, $@spellname252781 spreads to players within $252845A1 yards.
